hi. i em using uTorrent  and when i downloaded the game it only stand on seeding.. what suld i do?

Get the program BitTorrent, from www.bittorrent.com, for free and install.
Double click on the .torrent file to load it into the program, then start it to get file downloading.

Use WinRAR (get it from this site and download with above program) to unpack the archive.

Use PowerISO (get torrent from this site and download with above program) to open/mount/burn the image file.

See www.gamecopyworld.com for more info, look on right on mainpage under main for newbie hints.
